name: Burned Memories
description:
"Where am I?

...WHO am I?"

An unfamiliar room. Strange happenings, sinister entities. 
A nightmarish distortion of reality.

Warning!
This game contains serious topics, like depression, delusions, self-harm, and suicide.
Please stay safe, and be careful if those topics affect you personally.

"Burned Memories" is a point & click adventure with hand-drawn images and classic riddles. It's a work in progress and tells a story about mental illnesses, self-doubt, traumata, and fears.

Available in English and German.

English is not my mother tongue, so it would be nice if you could tell me when I make some mistakes!

Made with Visionaire Studio 5

Version 8/6/2021

VERY early Version! Just a sneak peak.
There will be much more, including music and sound effects.
